00031 void list_chunks(heap_t * heap) //List all active chunks in a heap. 
00032 {
00033         heap_entry_t * ptr = (heap_entry_t *) heap->heap_location;
00034 
00035         printf("Scanning 0x%x\n", ptr);
00036 
00037         while (ptr) 
00038         {
00039                 printf("Chunk %x size %i used %i\n", ptr, ptr->size, ptr->used);
00040                 ptr = (heap_entry_t *) ptr->next;
00041         }
00042 }

00044 char exec_cmd()
00045 {
00046         printf("\n");
00047 
00048         if (strcmp("exit", Pointer) == 0)
00049         {
00050                 printf("Exit called\n");
00051                 exit(2);
00052         }
00053         else if (strcmp("help", Pointer) == 0)
00054         {
00055                 printf("Line - Command line tool for SimpleOS\n");
00056                 printf("Line - Executable compiled for Kernel version %i.%i.%i codename \"%s\"\n", KVERSION_MAJOR, KVERSION_MINOR, KVERSION_REVISION, KVERSION_CODENAME);
00057                 printf("Compiled as part of OS version %i.%i.%i codename \"%s\"\n", OS_VERSION_MAJOR, OS_VERSION_MINOR, OS_VERSION_REVISION, OS_VERSION_CODENAME);
00058                 printf("free - list memory information\n");
00059                 printf("reboot - request the kernel to reboot the system\n");
00060                 printf("uptime - Lists the seconds minutes and hours the system has been up for\n");
00061                 printf("lproc - Lists information about all scheduled processes\n");
00062                 printf("cls - Clear the screen\n");
00063         }
00064         else if (strcmp("cls", Pointer) == 0)
00065         {
00066                 clearscreen();
00067         }
00068         else if (strcmp("uptime", Pointer) == 0)
00069         {
00070                 unsigned long ticks = clock();
00071                 unsigned long ticks_per_second = cps;
00072 
00073                 unsigned int seconds = 0;
00074                 unsigned int minutes = 0;
00075                 unsigned int hours = 0;
00076 
00077                 seconds = ticks / ticks_per_second; //Use this temporarely
00078 
00079                 hours = (seconds / (60 * 60));
00080                 
00081                 unsigned int remainder = seconds % (60 * 60);
00082 
00083                 minutes = remainder / 60;
00084 
00085                 seconds = remainder % 60;
00086 
00087                 printf("The system has been alive for %i hours %i minutes and %i seconds\n", hours, minutes, seconds);
00088         }
00089         else if (strcmp("armageddon", Pointer) == 0)
00090         {
00091                 printf("Self-Destruct sequence activated\n");
00092 
00093                 unsigned int tdeath = 16;
00094 
00095                 while (1)
00096                 {
00097                         unsigned long time_for_splode = clock() + cps;
00098                         while (time_for_splode > clock()) {}
00099                         tdeath--;
00100 
00101                         printf("%i Seconds remaining\n", tdeath);
00102 
00103                         if (tdeath == 0)
00104                                 break;
00105                 }
00106 
00107                 printf("Hah, just kidding\n");
00108         }
00109         else if (strcmp("lproc", Pointer) == 0)
00110         {
00111                 printf("Listing active processes\n");
00112 
00113                 unsigned int iterator = 0;
00114 
00115                 while (1)
00116                 {
00117                         int pid = getProcessID(iterator);
00118 
00119                         if (pid == -1) break;
00120 
00121                         process_info_t info = getProcessInfo(pid);
00122                         printf("Process %i Name %s Time %i\n", info.pID, info.Name, info.processingTime);
00123 
00124                         iterator++;
00125                 }
00126 
00127                 printf("Done listing %i processes\n", iterator);
00128 
00129         } else if (strcmp("free", Pointer) == 0) {
00130                 printf("Free memory information\n");
00131                 MEM_LOC free_frames = getNumberOfFreeFrames();
00132                 MEM_LOC page_size = getPageSize();
00133                 printf("%i free frames of memory\n", free_frames);
00134                 printf("Each frame is %i bytes of memory\n", page_size);
00135                 printf("Therefore there are %i MBs of memory left\n", (free_frames * page_size) / 1024 / 1024);
00136 
00137         } else if (strcmp("reboot", Pointer) == 0) {
00138                 requestReboot();
00139         } else {
00140                 printf("Command %s not found\n", Pointer);
00141         }
00142 
00143         return 0;
00144 }

00152 int main(int argc, void* argv)
00153 {
00154         //syscall_setbg(0);
00155         //syscall_setfg(15);
00156         //syscall_cls();
00157 
00158         clearscreen();
00159 
00160         c_ptr = 0;
00161         postboxSetFlags(INPUT_BIT);
00162 
00163         cps = getClocksPerSecond();
00164 
00165         printf("Line - Executable compiled for Kernel version %i.%i.%i codename \"%s\"\n", KVERSION_MAJOR, KVERSION_MINOR, KVERSION_REVISION, KVERSION_CODENAME);
00166         printf("Compiled as part of OS version %i.%i.%i codename \"%s\"\n", OS_VERSION_MAJOR, OS_VERSION_MINOR, OS_VERSION_REVISION, OS_VERSION_CODENAME);
00167 
00168         printf("Line.x:> ");
00169         Pointer[0] = '\0';
00170 
00171         for (;;)
00172         {
00173 
00174                 if (postboxHasNext() == 1)
00175                 {
00176                         process_message message;
00177                         message = postboxGetNext();
00178                         
00179                         if (message.ID == INPUT_MESSAGE)
00180                         {
00181                                 //Its a input message alright
00182                                 if (message.message_data[0] == DEVICE_KEYBOARD)
00183                                 {
00184                                         //its a keyboard message even!
00185                                         char C = getAsciFromScancode(message.message_data[1], message.message_data[2]);
00186 
00187                                         if (C == '\r')
00188                                         {       
00189                                                 if (c_ptr != 0)
00190                                                 {
00191                                                         if (exec_cmd() == 1)
00192                                                                 break;
00193 
00194                                                         c_ptr = 0;
00195                                                         Pointer[c_ptr] = '\0';
00196                                                         printf("Line.x:> ");
00197                                                 }
00198                                         }
00199                                         else if (C == '\b')
00200                                         {
00201                                                 if (c_ptr != 0)
00202                                                 {
00203                                                         printf("\b \b");
00204                                                         c_ptr--;
00205                                                         Pointer[c_ptr] = '\0';
00206                                                 }
00207                                         }
00208                                         else
00209                                         {
00210                                                 Pointer[c_ptr] = C;
00211                                                 Pointer[c_ptr + 1] = '\0';
00212                                                 c_ptr++;
00213                                                 printf("%c", C);
00214                                         }
00215                                 }
00216                         }
00217                 }
00218 
00219                 sleepProcess();
00220         }
00221 
00222         return 1;
00223 }
